executeSwapWithPermit(mapping(bytes32 =>.details: Validates and processes the swap, handles permits, and updates the state with a new order.

params.feeParams: Fee parameters including rates for both sellers and buyers.
params.releases: An array of release conditions for the swap, dictating how and when funds are released.
params.swap: Details of the swap including the tokens, amounts, and participant signatures.
params.swapOrder: The storage mapping of current swap orders.
params.vault: The address of the vault where tokens are held during the swap.
params.vestingManager: The address of the vesting manager, handling any vesting requirements.

returns.id: The unique identifier of the newly created swap order.

generateNewAtomicSwapID(bytes32,address).details: Utilizes the keccak256 hashing function to create a unique ID from the input parameters.

params.contractAddress: The address of the contract using the ID, adding an extra layer of uniqueness.
params.uuid: A unique value used to generate the ID, ensuring uniqueness.

returns.id: The generated unique identifier for the swap order.

executeSwapWithPermit(mapping(bytes32 =>.notice: Executes a swap with the given parameters and permits, setting up the atomic swap.

generateNewAtomicSwapID(bytes32,address).notice: Generates a new unique identifier for an atomic swap order.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes32,address,contract IVesting,struct IAtomicSwapBase.SwapWithPermitMsg calldata,struct IAtomicSwapBase.Release calldata[] calldata,struct IAtomicSwapBase.FeeParams memory)
